successes.title: Neptune Pine: Smartwatch. Reinvented.
successes.description: Neptune Pine, the definitive all-in-one smartwatch. Voice calls, video chat, full keyboard, GPS & much more.

Pledges.description: Thanks for helping us out! Keep up-to-date on the latest Neptune Pine smartwatch developments with exclusive updates.

NEPTUNE CLIP: Get a Neptune Clip for your Pine. A great accessory for snapping your Pine to your belt or pocket. Savings of $6 off $25 MSRP. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)
NEPTUNE WATCHBAND: Get a Jet Black or Polar White Neptune Watchband for your Pine. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)

NEPTUNE PULSECOUNTER: Get a Neptune PulseCounter, an accurate, real-time heart-rate monitor for your Pine. Savings of $11 off $40 MSRP. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)
EARLY ADOPTER 16GB: Get a 16GB Jet Black Neptune Pine. Savings of $136 off $335 MSRP. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)
PINE 16GB BLACK: Get a 16GB Jet Black Neptune Pine. Savings of $106 off $335 MSRP. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)
PINE 16GB BLACK or WHITE: Get a 16GB Jet Black or Polar White Neptune Pine. Savings of $86 off $335 MSRP. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)
PINE NFC 8GB: Get an 8GB NFC-enabled Jet Black or Polar White Neptune Pine. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)

REWARDS 16GB COMBO PACK: Get a 16GB Jet Black Neptune Pine and the Trio Accessories Pack. Includes Neptune Clip, PulseCounter and Head Mount. Savings of $181 off $450 MSRP. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)
EARLY ADOPTER 32GB: Get a 32GB Jet Black Neptune Pine. Savings of $116 off $395 MSRP. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)

REWARDS NFC COMBO PACK: Get an 8GB NFC-enabled Jet Black or Polar White Neptune Pine and the Trio Accessories Pack. Includes Neptune Clip, PulseCounter and Helmet Mount. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)
PINE 32GB BLACK: Get a 32GB Jet Black Neptune Pine. Savings of $106 off $395 MSRP. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)
PINE 32GB BLACK or WHITE: Get a 32GB Jet Black or Polar White Neptune Pine. Savings of $86 off $395 MSRP. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)

REWARDS 32GB COMBO PACK: Get a 32GB Jet Black Neptune Pine and the Trio Accessories Pack. Includes Neptune Clip, PulseCounter and Head Mount. Savings of $181 off $510 MSRP. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)
LIMITED EDITION 64GB: Get a 64GB Jet Black or Polar White Neptune Pine. Limited Edition only available on Kickstarter. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)

REWARDS 64GB COMBO PACK: Get a 64GB Jet Black or Polar White Neptune Pine and the Trio Accessories Pack. Includes Neptune Clip, PulseCounter and Helmet Mount. (Free shipping to Canada & US. Add $15 for international shipping.)

GOLD MASTER COMBO PACK: Get a 32GB Neptune Pine in any color you desire and the Trio Accessories Pack. As a special thank you for your support, we will include a personalized, engraved message on the back of your Pine. Includes Neptune Clip, PulseCounter and Head Mount. (Free shipping worldwide.)
